author.description: Display name of you, the active developer of the HUD (however, outdated HUD maintenance may not count as authoring in some cases)

contributors.description: Display names of anyone you would like to credit for the creation/development of the HUD. Not to be used for general credits, but major and direct contributors

releaseDate.description: Initial release date of the HUD

social.description: Links to your social media profiles

support.description: A link people can use to support you financially

issues.description: An extra link where users can get help/report issues. If not present, will use GitHub Issues.

discord.description: Your Discord invite code, not the full URL

album.description: Link to some Imgur album or other to provide more images

flags.description: A list of boolean flags whose presence indicates the existence of a feature of some kind

os.description: What operating systems does the HUD support

gamemode.description: What gamemodes does the HUD customize for

res.description: What aspect ratios does the HUD support

position.description: What position is the ammo/health in the HUD (multiple customization options can be available)

lang.description: What languages does the HUD support (if it has custom language files)

tags.description: A list of words associated with the HUD for discovery. Be general. First tag is considered primary and used as a category. There is no list of valid tags, but they are subject to review for usefulness/'spamminess'.

repo.description: The URL to the repository where the HUD is hosted

hash.description: The hash of the latest commit in the repository

prerelease.description: Whether the HUD is a prerelease

verified.description: Whether the HUD has been verified by a member of the  team

parent.description: The name of the HUD this HUD is based on

resources.description: A list of resources associated with the HUD
